title: ChicWick Candles 3Pack Cherry Splendor Soy Blend Wax Melts 9oz 18 Wax Cubes Wax Tarts Wax Chunks,100 Plus Hours of Quality Fragrance
description: Like Cherry Jubilee with a twist of fruit! It will take you straight to a cherry grove. This scent is fruity, thick, fresh and sweet. Cherry Splendor would be a great addition to your home! All ChicWick products are made in the USA,. Welcome to the fragrance of ChicWick! Our soy blend wax is hand spun at our factory in Yukon Oklahoma. Each melt contains the highest amount of fragrance that will adhere to our very own soy blend. Our soy blend is a slow burning clean burning wax. We pride ourselves on our fragrance. "Our Melts Simply Smell Better" Color varies by fragrance. Experience the fragrance of ChicWick Candles and add that long lasting aroma to any room. We also pride ourselves on customer service. ChicWick is looking for candle customers and believe in quality at a fair price. Thank you for your interest in our quality products. Item ships out next day in most cases. Free Shipping! Get your ChicWick On!
